casebody.data:
MODERN HOME BUILDERS, INC., a Florida Corporation, v. W. L. STRIBLING, et al. 23 So. (2nd) 735

June Term, 1945

November 16, 1945 Division B Simonhoff & Simonhoff and J. Lewis Hall, for appellant. Thomas H. Anderson, for Appellee. PER CURIAM:

The decree appealed from is affirmed without prejudice to plaintiff below to seasonably apply to the circuit court for leave to file an amended bill of complaint.

It is so ordered.

CHAPMAN, C. J., BROWN, THOMAS and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
